body.name: Beberoad Love R2 Lightweight Compact Baby Stroller Foldable Travel Stroller for Baby Newborn Infant Toddler with Adjustable Backrest, Cup Holder, Storage Basket and UPF 50+ & Waterproof Canopy, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 23 mins
features: 🖐One-Hand Quick Folding: This portable baby stroller features one-hand operation, super easy for quick opening and folding. Its compact folding feature makes it easy to carry, transport, or store.

👶 Perfect for Baby: The stroller features an adjustable backrest that offers flexible inclination, ranging from 110°to 152°, providing an ideal sleeping or lying position for newborns. With a maximum weight capacity of 45lbs (20.5 kg) on the seat, it is suitable for babies aged 0-36 months.

✈ Lightweight and Compact: Designed with a stylish aluminum frame, this lightweight stroller weighs only 13.6 pounds, sturdy and lightweight. The folding dimessions are 18.5"L x 9.8"W x 21.8"H, allowing it fit flexibly into airplane luggage cabins or luggage racks. It also comes with a travel bag for easy carrying.

👍Excellent Protection: The stroller is equipped with suspension wheels and a brake system, ensuring a smooth and safe ride. Featured with brake, footwall fabric and UPF 50+ & waterproof canopy with sunshade extension, the stroller provides comprehensive protection for your baby during outdoor travel. Also 2 peek-a-boo windows let parents observe their babies easily.

😍Thoughtful Design for Easy Travel：The stroller comes with convenient accessories such as a cup holder, rain cover, and travel bag. Aslo the rear pocket and underneath storage basket provide more space for baby essentials. Moreover, it fits for some popular car seats, super easy to install the dedicated car seat adaptor (need to purchase separately). The stroller also compatible with our glider board, catering to almost all your outdoor travel needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Footwall Mesh Give the little ones a better protection Travel Bag Families enjoy a happier trip with a travel bag, easier to carry and store strollers Rain Cover Rain cover included , no worries about getting a ride in rainy days

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel stroller
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for a family trip to San Diego. Used for 8 days of Disney, zoo, sea world and walks on boardwalk.What we loved: folds down to be so small. Collapsing and opening so easy. So light weight (we had to carry it up and down a flight of steps multiple times a day and I could lift it and the baby at the same time). Smooth wheels for smooth ride. The recline function let our baby take naps on the go! All the flaps and air vents are great! Buckles held baby in well and were fairly easy to use. The footrest goes up and down which is great for baby to sit or nap easily.Did not like: my husband is 6’1” and the stroller is too short for him. He has to lean over a bit to push. I’m 5’4” and thought it was a great height. The lock for the wheels is touchy. It does lock the wheels, but gets stuck on lock at times. The basket is small for stuffing all the things (does have snaps which helps a bit)Overall, I would highly recommend for a travel stroller. Will I use it all the time around my home/neighborhood?! No. But very happy with its use on a trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific travel stroller!
reviews.reviewText: I used this stroller multiple times per day for 7 days on a cruise and it’s so awesome that I plan on using it for all future vacations and trips around town. It fit nicely through the stateroom doorway, is very easy to push and turn with 1 hand, can be folded or unfolded with 1 hand even with a baby in the other arm , and is light enough to carry while also small enough when folded to fit under the bed. My daughter napped in it at least once per day and I loved that the seat almost fully reclined (and easily moved up and down as I needed), the foot rest comes up to make it more comfortable to sleep and the back rolls up so there’s mesh where the air can easily flow in and out.A huge buying factor for me was having a basket underneath that could fit my diaper bag and this did! Sure, I had to squeeze it in a little bit, but the end of the basket unsnaps to make it much easier. It also carries up to 8lbs in the basket and I never felt like it was going to rip or things would fall out.When not rolling up the back for the mesh lining to show, it has a nice size pocket where we kept my cell phone, our room keys and a ziplock of her snacks. I read other reviews saying the brake was too easy to accidentally hit, but I never had that problem and never felt like I was stepping close to it at all.Two bonus features are the bar across the seat which I was able to easily wrap her travel fan arms around, and the canopy can extend down enough to cover her entire upper body when sleeping.I’d definitely recommend this to everyone, especially for cruising!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing stroller for travel! Don’t worry about paying hundreds more for the babyzen yoyo!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this stroller hoping for the best, but expecting not the greatest…..boy was I impressed when it arrived! Firstly it’s a very smooth ride, all the components feel & look well made and it feels very comfortable for the baby in the back section that the baby lies on. My daughter was just shy of 4 months old when we used it. We took it to Australia and I used it daily…all terrains I used it on worked well…..concrete paths, hard sand on the beach, unsealed beach paths (slightly rocky).It went on the plane as hand luggage which was awesome - just had to remove the bumper bar for it to fit in the overhead compartmentThe recline is near flat which worked brilliantly for sleeps.Good amount of space below for shopping or baby bag.Easy to fold up and down one handed.My only gripes were :1. the umbrella that comes down does not stay down firmly due to the position of the zipper if you have it out in expanded mode…..it’s a bit annoying but not a deal breaker. You have to keep pulling it down as it creeps up as you are moving2. I didn’t take any stroller clips with me which meant making it dark by covering it with a muslin wrap was tricky, but easily fixed by taking pegs.After using this stroller there is no way I’d pay for the babyzen yoyo. I’ve had one of them in the past that was stolen …. but you can’t go past the price of this stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good stroller for reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this stroller for traveling to Europe alone with my daughter. And i’m so glad I did. I enjoyed the smooth rides and the the way that it reclines fully. My toddler took so many naps on it everyday everywhere. It is so lightweight and small when it’s folded. So easy to fold specially if you’re traveling solo and you have to carry your baby with one hand, this stroller makes it so much easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Allowed inside flight
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as I was travelling with my 4 month old baby from US to India. The flight crew had no problem whatsoever to take it inside as part of cabin luggage. It fits perfectly fine on overhead cabin. Highly recommended if you are flying. Wouldn't advise this for regular or daily use. Too good for indoors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Umbrella Stroller
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as somewhat of an impulse buy for our Disneyland trip. We had a 4yo and 8 month old and after trying out a double stroller, we decided we would just bring two single strollers.From the moment we pulled this stroller out of the box, we knew it was different in the best way possible. It’s so light and compact, even when it’s open. You can close and open it with one hand, maneuvers like butter (seriously!). The entire time at Disneyland, we just kept saying how much we like the stroller. In fact, we will buy a second one for our next trip, so we aren’t lugging around our jogger as the other single stroller.Cons? Not really a con, just is what is in…. It’s obviously not an “all terrain” stroller. It does not roll well off paved road. But it does roll like butter on paved road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great light weight stroller.
reviews.reviewText: We recently purchased because we are traveling a lot and wanted a stroller that was compact and lightweight. Just finished week long vacation and stroller worked great. Love that the foot rest is adjustable and reclined to lay down position. The only down side is, when you fold it. There isn’t a clip or anything to hold it all together, so if you don’t hold it all together it will just open back up again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller
reviews.reviewText: Best stroller ever bought! Easy to maneuver. Fits in small spaces! Light enough to carry! Fits my 4 month old perfectly! Looking forward to taking it on vacation
